references.paper_title: Remember what you want to forget: Algorithms for machine unlearning
references.reason: This paper provides a foundational work on machine unlearning, introducing algorithms and theoretical analysis for approximate unlearning.

references.paper_title: Certified data removal from machine learning models
references.reason: This paper proposes a method for certified data removal, addressing the need for stronger privacy guarantees in machine unlearning.

references.paper_title: Descent-to-delete: Gradient-based methods for machine unlearning
references.reason: This paper introduces a gradient-based approach to machine unlearning, providing a practical and efficient method for approximate unlearning.

references.paper_title: Differential privacy dynamics of Langevin diffusion and noisy gradient descent
references.reason: This paper analyzes the differential privacy properties of Langevin dynamics and noisy gradient descent, which are crucial for understanding the privacy guarantees in Langevin unlearning.

references.paper_title: Rapid convergence of the unadjusted Langevin algorithm: Isoperimetry suffices
references.reason: This paper provides a theoretical foundation for the convergence analysis of Langevin dynamics, which is essential for understanding the convergence properties of Langevin unlearning.
